segments.text: Mark ? I need that file you took yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , Janet . I left it at home . I ’ ll bring it back in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mark , I told you yesterday afternoon that I would be using that file today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , Janet . I just walked out and forgot it completely . I ’ ll go home and get it at noon , all right ?
segments.speaker: S2
